alert.note: Alert for Pacific; Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 12:24AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Washington, including the following counties, Pacific and Wahkiakum. * WHEN...Until 315 AM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1222 AM PST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Long Beach, Frances, Grays River, Ocean Park, Raymond, South Bend, Ilwaco, Lebam, Rosburg, Naselle, Skamokawa, Brooklyn, Bay Center, Tokeland, Menlo, Willapa, Deep River, Sutico, Nemah and Altoona. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
